hints.content:
$\goldE{?}+261=630$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 261 to point 630 is labeled, plus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/eab97058966109151262a757c326858480c97bed)

Let's start by adding hundreds to ${261}$ until we get as close to  ${630}$ as possible without going over ${630}$.

$\begin{align}
{261} +\purpleD{100}=361\\\\
{361} +\purpleD{100}=461\\\\
{461} +\purpleD{100}=561
\end{align}$

If we add $\purpleD{3 \text{ hundreds}}$, or $\purpleD{300}$, we reach $561$. We cannot add anymore hundreds without going over ${630}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 261 to a new point 561 labeled, "plus 300"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d7d3e4657a388913f4a40eafdcf1ddf9ed2fa251)

Next, let's add tens to $561$ until we get as close to  ${630}$ as possible without going over ${630}$.

$\begin{align}
561 +\blueD{10}=571\\\\
{571} +\blueD{10}=581\\\\
{581} +\blueD{10}=591\\\\
{591} +\blueD{10}=601\\\\
{601} +\blueD{10}=611\\\\
{611} +\blueD{10}=621
\end{align}$

If we add $\blueD{6 \text{ tens}}$, or $\blueD{60}$, we reach $621$. We cannot add anymore tens without going over ${630}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 561 to a new point 621 labeled, "plus 60"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c1ed674b56440045ffbd657b21821d0d15feff27)

Finally, how many ones should we add to  $621$ to get to  ${630}?$

$621+\greenD{9}={630}$

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 621 to point 630 labeled, "plus 9"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5cd4ab050e5d1c77869d47bac3ab638c81b91d1e)

We added $\purpleD{3 \text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{6 \text{ tens}}$, and $\greenD{9\text{ ones}}$ to ${261}$ to get to ${630}$.

$\purpleD{300}+\blueD{60}+\greenD{9}=\goldE{369}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 261 to point 630 is labeled, "plus 369." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "plus 300," "plus 60," and "plus 9."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/81a94cf6b46963e8e44eab6f040c261c10e76abb)

question.content:
**What number makes this equation true?** 

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] ${}+261=630$
